BasicInfo.short: Chariot crowdsources and operates transit routes, offering affordable taxis and ride-sharing.

Products.name: Fisherman's Flyer
Products.description: Fisherman's Flyer connects commuters from the Embarcadero BART station with the commercial areas of Fisherman's Wharf and Ghirardelli Square

Products.name: SoMa Express
Products.description: SoMa Express providers commuters fast and reliable service from the Marina, Cow Hollow, and Pac Heights to SoMa, BART, and Caltrain.

Products.name: West SoMa Direct
Products.description: West SoMa Direct connects riders in the Marina, Cow Hollow, and Russian Hill with the corridors of Civic Center, Mid-Market, and West SoMa.

Products.name: California Dreamin'
Products.description: California Dreamin' provides express service from the Presidio and Lower Pac Heights to FiDi, SoMa, BART, and Caltrain.

Products.name: Richmond Racer
Products.description: Richmond Racer provides a fast and reliable route from the Outer and Inner Richmond to FiDi, SoMa, BART, and Caltrain.

Products.name: The Great Haight
Products.description: The Great Haight takes commuters from Haight-Ashbury/Cole Valley to FiDi, SoMa, BART, and Caltrain.

Products.name: Chestnut Bullet
Products.description: Chestnut Bullet is Chariot's first route, connecting commuters in the Marina to FiDi, BART, and East SoMa.

Products.name: Pacific Rush
Products.description: Pacific Rush provides reliable service from Pac Heights and Nob Hill to FiDi, SoMa, BART, and Caltrain.
